Episodes.Title: Thwack
Episodes.Plot: Faced with the aftermath of Shane having murdered Pilar, Nancy grabs Shane and Silas and they flee the scene. Andy is then met with the decision to split town with his family or stay and fight for Audra's affection.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Demian Bichir, Alanis Morissette, Enrique Castillo, Mo Gallini, Matt Peters, Renée Victor

Episodes.Title: Felling and Swamping
Episodes.Plot: After hours of aimless driving, Nancy, ignoring Shane's suggestion of hiding out in Pittsburgh, hatches a plan for the family to cross into Canada. Andy is tasked with acquiring fake IDs. Silas must decide if he's willing to live on the lam. Elsewhere, Esteban must answer to authorities regarding Pilar's murder and Nancy's whereabouts.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: A Yippity Sippity
Episodes.Plot: Nancy becomes a scab labor in a Seattle hotel while Shane looks after Stevie and Doug goes back to Ren Mar
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Bliss
Episodes.Plot: Nancy makes a deal with the concierge and Shane becomes part of a mommy group. Meanwhile, Doug is questioned by Cesar and Ignacio.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Boomerang
Episodes.Plot: The Botwins' flight continues after a parking violation and Doug gets into a hostage situation.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: A Shoe for a Shoe
Episodes.Plot: Nancy brings her son back while Andy and Silas wait in a diner.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Pinwheels and Whirligigs
Episodes.Plot: Nancy decides that her family has seen enough gunslinging for a lifetime, so to lighten things up she takes them to a Montana fair. Andy and Silas enter a butter-eating contest while Doug looks after the baby and makes friends with the carneys. Elsewhere, Nancy escorts Shane on a rollercoaster where they stir up some trouble in line.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Gentle Puppies
Episodes.Plot: After acquiring an RV, Nancy lets Andy navigate the road and he leads them to Pioneer Town, a former western movie set now turned off-the-grid scab city. While Nancy attempts to get the lay of the land, she instructs the family to set up a mobile hash making shop inside the RV. Andy and Silas work on getting laundry machines while Doug and Shane try to obtain water.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: To Moscow, and Quickly
Episodes.Plot: Nancy is met with yet another roadblock when baby Stevie gets sick leaving her and Andy to scramble to find a pediatrician. Meanwhile, Silas, Shane and Doug are tasked with unloading some merchandise at a kiddie concert.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Dearborn-Again
Episodes.Plot: Nancy, attempting to score some big cash, returns to her hometown where she takes up residence with Warren an old acquaintance. Andy and Doug try to secure information on where to locate fake passports. Meanwhile, Silas and Shane curiously dig into Nancy's past.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Viking Pride
Episodes.Plot: Nancy, trying to get she and her family out of the country, is continually faced with unexpected guests from her past. Andy has to get creative in order to secure passports while Doug must find his own means of obtaining one. Meanwhile, Silas deals with the possibility that Lars could be his father. Shane is left to deal with Warren who is becoming unhinged.

Episodes.Title: Fran Tarkenton
Episodes.Plot: Nancy has a tense, one-on-one, sit-down interview with Vaughn. Andy, Shane and Warren to get more cash plus passports they'll need for the family to enter Europe. Silas continues to wrestle with the fact that Lars may be his father. Meanwhile, Doug returns to Agrestic to locate his passport.

Episodes.Title: Theoretical Love is Not Dead
Episodes.Plot: In the season 6 finale, Nancy must free herself from the grip of Esteban in order to escape the country along with her family. At the airport, Andy attempts to calm the nerves of Shane and Warren. Meanwhile, Silas must decide whether to stay with Lars or leave with the Botwins.
